key.name: dark-theme
key.description: Use the dark variant of your Gtk theme. Please note that not every Gtk theme has a dark variant.

key.name: first-start-screen
key.description: Automatically open the unlock screen of the last opened database, otherwise show the welcome screen.

key.name: save-automatically
key.description: Save every change you made instantly into the database. Please note that you cannot revert changes if Autosave is enabled.

key.name: database-lock-timeout
key.description: Automatically lock your database after a given amount of minutes to improve the security.

key.name: clear-clipboard
key.description: After copying the password clear the clipboard for security reasons.

key.name: show-password-fields
key.description: Show the passwords in the entry fields by default.

key.name: last-opened-database
key.description: Path to the last opened database.

key.name: last-opened-list
key.description: A list of the last opened databases.

key.name: remember-composite-key
key.description: Remember last used composite key for database unlocking.

key.name: last-used-composite-key
key.description: Path to last used key for composite database unlocking.

key.name: remember-unlock-method
key.description: Remember last used unlock method for future database unlocking.

key.name: sort-order
key.summary: Sorting order of groups and entries
key.description: Order of the rows in the groups and entries view.

key.name: unlock-method
key.description: Used to store the last used unlock method and to enable a faster unlock process.
